tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE debt_management (
  debtor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  debtor_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  debt_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  last_payment_date DATE,
  payment_reminder_sent BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE CommunicationLog (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    debtor_name VARCHAR(100),
    communication_date DATE,
    communication_type VARCHAR(50),
    communication_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE reminders (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  debtor_id INT,
  reminder_date DATE,
  message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE collection_letters (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  debtor_id INT,
  letter_date DATE,
  overdue_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  letter_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE debtors (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  phone VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE payments (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  debtor_id INT,
  payment_date DATE,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  debtor_id INT,
  log_date DATE,
  communication_type VARCHAR(50),
  message TEXT
)
